eMail Body Start (admin_eMailBodyStart).defaultValue: Power Platform

metadata.description: Inventory - Starter HTML format for eMails
Inventory - Ending HTML format for eMails

eMail Header Style (admin_eMailHeaderSty.defaultValue: <head>     <style>         body {             background-color: #efefef;             font-family: Segoe UI;             text-align: center;         }          #content {             border: 1px solid #742774;             background-color: #ffffff;             width: 650px;             margin-bottom: 50px;             display: inline-block;         }          #logo {             margin-left: 52px;             margin-top: 40px;             width: 60px;             height: 12px;         }          #header {             font-size: 24px;             margin-left: 50px;             margin-top: 20px;             margin-bottom: 20px;         }          #ribbon {             background-color: #742774;         }          #ribbonContent {             font-size: 20px;             padding-left: 30px;             padding-top: 10px;             padding-bottom: 20px;             color: white;             width: 100%;             padding-right: 10px;         }          #message>td {             font-size: 14px;             padding-left: 60px;             padding-right: 60px;             padding-top: 20px;             padding-bottom: 40px;         }          #footer>td {             font-size: 12px;             background-color: #cfcfcf;             height: 40px;             padding-top: 15px;             padding-left: 40px;             padding-bottom: 20px;         }          #form {             width: 100%;             border-collapse: collapse;         }          #app {             width: 60%;             font-size: 12px;         }          .label {             color: #5f5f5f         }          table {             border-collapse: collapse;             width: 100%;         }          th,         td {             padding: 8px;             text-align: left;             border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd;         }     </style> </head>

metadata.description: Inventory - CoE Admin eMail. Email address used in flows to send notifications to admins; this should be either your email address or a distribution list
Inventory - Yes by default. Set to No if you are creating a dev type envt. This will allow some flows to set target users to the admin instead of resource owners
Inactivity Processes - The interval for the past time for how far back to go to see if an app/flow is useful. Default is 6, (for 6 months)

Inactivity Processes - The units for the past time for how far back to go to see if an app/flow is useful. Default is Month (for 6 months). Options are those of the Add to time action's Time Unit Parameter
Inventory - REQUIRED. An individual admin's email. Some actions (approvals / team chats) cannot accept a group/DL. So this env variable is for those instances in the kit.
Inventory - REQUIRED. The maker URL used by PowerApps for your cloud. Ex https://make.powerapps.com/
Inventory - The preferred language for the emails sent to the admin email alias, which is specified in theAdmin eMail environment variable. Default is en-US
Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

Already_Rejected_-_Clean_up_other_approv.inputs: Request Rejected. That rejection will time out in 1 month and then will recreate

parameters.$filter: admin_basedon eq '@{outputs('emailGUID_to_en-US_2')}' and admin_language eq '@{parameters('Admin eMail Preferred Language (admin_AdmineMailPreferredLanguage)')}'

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

body.text_1:
@{outputs('Get_a_row_by_ID_2')?['body/admin_body']}
Display Name: @{items('Create_Archival_Request_for_Each')?['admin_displayname']}
Environment: @{items('Create_Archival_Request_for_Each')?['admin_appenvironment/admin_displayname']}
App ID: @{items('Create_Archival_Request_for_Each')?['admin_appid']}
Link: Link to Power Apps app

parameters.$select: admin_body, admin_cc, admin_replyto, admin_sendonbehalf, admin_subject, admin_importance

Get_past_time.description: If the app has not been modified in the past x months, an approval to archive will trigger. Update your desired archive months here.

Initialize_var_CleanUpTextType.description: 0 = both blank, 1 = neither blank, 2 = approval blank, 3 = app blank

parameters.$select: admin_archiveapprovalid, admin_appname, admin_appdisplayname,  admin_appenvironmentname, admin_approvalresponsedate, admin_approvalresponse

admin_appid, _admin_appenvironment_value, cr5d5_appisorphaned, admin_appmodifiedon,admin_displayname, admin_appownerdisplayname, _admin_appowner_value, admin_applastlaunchedon, admin_apparchiverequestignoredsince
parameters.$filter: (admin_appmodifiedon lt @{body('Get_past_time')} or admin_appmodifiedon eq null) and admin_appdeleted eq false  and (admin_applastlaunchedon lt @{body('Get_past_time')} or admin_applastlaunchedon eq null) and admin_powerappstype eq 597910000 and admin_appexcusedfromarchival ne true and admin_AppEnvironment/admin_excusefromarchivalflows ne true and admin_AppEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted ne true and _admin_appenvironment_value ne null

Set_env_var_ApprovalsURL.description: must use old technique for fetching as env var is optional

Set_env_var_CleanUpAppURL.description: must use old technique for fetching as env var is optional

Renaming_notification.inputs:
In order to avoid confusion we have now renamed this area from referencing Archivals to referencing Inactivity notifications
This flow was previously called: Admin | Archive and Clean Up v2 (Start Approval for Apps)

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date
